Hello, and welcome to my new corner of the internet.
I created this blog for a simple reason: I wanted a place to jot down thoughts as they come. It’s a space for the random ideas, the sometimes trivial musings, and the interesting things I happen to come across :)

title: My thoughts on toothpastes - H2 ’25
text:
I’ve tried a lot of toothpastes over the years, especially moving between Germany and India. While the general recommendation of “as long as there’s flouride in your toothpaste, anything works” is strictly true, the follwoing breakdown considers mainly the taste, after-taste and how easily it lathers, for my case in particular. Here are my quick thoughts on a few of them, starting with my current go-to.






Tip🏆 Top Recommendation: Aronal



Price: €€
The mild aftertaste of cloves is the most balanced I’ve ever found in any toothpaste. Combined with its excellent fluoride content and optimal pH level, this is my daily morning go-to.
